website_summaries.verdict: A planner with few frills but plenty of space and organization to keep your school year on track.
pros: Paperback planner for up to 6 children
Map out lessons by month and week, or use to record progress
Space to record attendance and grades
Colored edges help you find various sections quickly
cons: Spiral binding would make this organizer more practical

customer_reviews.title: I wish it was spiral-bound.
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this planner, but right out of the box there was a problem: It's not spiral-bound. If there is ever a remake of this planner, a spiral-bound book would be a serious upgrade. It's a pain for me to find my place again and again when referring to my schedule for the day. It would be way more helpful to have it lying open to the desired page when I need it. Otherwise, it would be a very useful planner. It's disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleena

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure at first but after I got the planner I am in love with it. I have never bought a homeschool planner before but used regular planners, an extremely simple lesson planner and used many free ones online. This one is just right with daily spaces for more than one kid. I love how much space and the Extras section for noting improvements, field trips, books. The calendar area allows me to keep track of everything in this one book! The only thing I would add is maybe an area for curriculum purchase planning for the following year and/or a pocket to keep things like letters from the school district, etc. Definitely buying again.
customer_reviews.author: RosieB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent planner for multiple children in different grades
customer_reviews.text: I like this planner so much that I purchased it a second time for this coming school year. It helps my homeschool day flow seamlessly with the easy layout. I have 3 children, two of which are doing school. The planner accommodates up to 6 children so I could easily add educational activities for my toddler if I choose to. The planner has a section for yearly goals, monthly glances to assist with planning around major events and then daily activities and assignments. I complete the plan for each school week and then glance at the activities for each day. I haven't tried other planners but this will forever be my go-to planner as long as it's in print.
customer_reviews.author: Erica T

customer_reviews.title: Meh, very basic
customer_reviews.text: Meh. This is very basic, so it would be good for someone who is in desperate need of a place to start organizing. I don’t like the binding and that it will not lay flat and it’s basically a repeat of just a few pages. Although the pages are useful and you need many “weekly” organization papers to finish out a year, I would not recommend this to anyone other than a person who has no experience planning anything (not just a homeschool schedule). Most people are going to want much more than this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, straight forward, and flexible
customer_reviews.text: Simple, straight forward, and flexible. What more could you want in a planner? The little nuggets of wisdom on each page might be my favorite part. After 7 years of homeschooling, I think I found a planner I can stick with. I do wish it was spiral bound, but that’s only a minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: HomeschoolHippieChick

customer_reviews.title: Great for Virtual School too!
customer_reviews.text: So I am not homeschooling, but virtual school and extra curricular activities for 5 children gives me a lot to keep track of. This helps tremendously! It also gives me a good record (by checking off as we go) of what we've missed or chosen not to do. Using a calendar alone just wasn't good enough. This helps more to fill in the exact activities and classes, then cross check before making plans in our actual Google calendar. Starting this practice is probably the best thing to come out of 2020!
customer_reviews.author: Family is everything!!

customer_reviews.title: Simple and complete
customer_reviews.text: I really like this homeschool planner. The only thing I wish it included was a place to list all curriculum used. It is a very simple layout though. Perfect for what I need. It has the year at a glance layout page, months pages, them a week layout and immediately following each week layout is the grades page for that week. I also love that it has room for all 4 of my students information.
customer_reviews.author: SereneChaos

customer_reviews.title: The best planner ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to start our homeschool journey, it really made keeping up with my four kids easy. I was able to plan a year at a glance, as well as each month and even each week. I am able to keep track of our homeschool time which is state required as well as include space to plan fun activities. I lost the planner for a week and I was ready to order a replacement, it is that valuable to our schooling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This planner is absolutely amazing, everything i was hoping for as a first time homeschooler and more. It explains how to fill out each section in the first few pages. Between the provided guide and real life examples found online, i now confidently have a plan for the whole school year with plenty of wiggle room for adjustments and changes as we go. I couldn't ask for a more comprehensive planner. Thank you to this company for making this whole process so much less stressful, truly from the bottom of my heart thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: The best homeschool planner
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't ask for a better planner. It's great for anyone who just casually jots info down all the way to the obsessive detailer looking to track everything. Simple layout, easy to use. I had mine spiral bound at the local office supply retailer for $5
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Nelon

customer_reviews.title: Almost awesome
customer_reviews.text: Really would love to give this five stars as I love the lay out and design of the pages. However the binding is a poor style as it won’t lay flat. I ended up pulling the pages out and putting them in a 3 ring binder.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was in a binder rather than a binding it would be easier to turn the pages without them falling back and having to find my pages again, but honestly everything else is great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great planner.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this planner. Lots of space for planning, writing goals, and jotting down notes. This is our 5th year of homeschooling and I've used more expensive planners and this is one of the best. I agree with others that I wish it was spiral bound.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Just a planner.
customer_reviews.text: Just a glorified day planer. Any “advice” was nice, but really just common sense stuff that could be found for free in any forum. I do like the layout, and the price is reasonable for a planner so only took one star off.
customer_reviews.author: G. Zane

customer_reviews.title: This needs to be spiral bound
customer_reviews.text: I like using it, but the lack of spiral binding, especially given the cost, is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mosier

customer_reviews.title: Not a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not happy about this product. We aren’t even half way through the homeschool year and the pages are falling out of the book. I love the layout and the function of planner. I love it has grading and planning all in one but it defeats the purpose when the pages are falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Shall0221

customer_reviews.title: Great planner for homeschool!!
customer_reviews.text: We just started homeschooling our kids this school year and I'm so happy I purchased this planner! It has everything you need to keep track of... well... everything! I saw where some have complained of the binding, but it really isn't a big deal for me. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: NC Coast

customer_reviews.title: Love this planner!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this planner! I am homeschooling my two and four year olds, this planner is great for keeping us organized and our goals on track. I love the little tips and quotes throughout the book. I will be purchasing this planner every year
customer_reviews.author: melissa guist

customer_reviews.title: Great Planner. Arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I like this planner a lot. Especially the spacing between lines which isn’t too small nor or too wasteful allowing me to fit our to do’s easily. However, mine arrived with several pages and back cover with water damage. Unsure if box had water damage. Disappointed because I bought for someone so I had to run to bookstore and buy a generic one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Layout is difficult for what I need
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this planner but I just can’t. The layout with the month section in The front, then a separate week section (not with each month) and the grades page with each week (not together) is going to make a lot of flipping. Also, there is a minimal planning area (I had hoped for are area each month to outline and plan so I could stay on track but it is only the one page in the picture provided).
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Will become your favorite planner easily
customer_reviews.text: My fav planner ever! I homeschool my 3 kids and it has space for really up to 6 kids in it so i can just add more stuff for them to do in to fill it up! Great for first time homeschool families or for those who are homeschooling hs seniors!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Likely a good choice for large families
customer_reviews.text: At first glance, this planner hits the mark. It’s well-organized and bigger than most planners. I hope I can get it to lay flat, but spirals can be a love/hate relationship.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Started filling in this super savvy calendar last night and am loving the organization it will afford me!!
customer_reviews.author: Vessy M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a great homeschool planner
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a great planner. I can't wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: lady29bug

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginning homeschoolers and pros alike to keep things organized!
customer_reviews.author: Kellkrew

customer_reviews.title: Great planner!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this planner!!! I added tabs to it, that was the only adjustment I have needed so far with it❤️
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Planner
customer_reviews.text: A simple layout with lots of space for monthly and weekly planning.
customer_reviews.author: Messemme

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of the best things I’ve bought for myself for homeschooling. It’s helped me stay on track so much better than before I had this planner!
customer_reviews.author: Amberina

customer_reviews.title: Great lesson planner
customer_reviews.text: Love this book. Nice and organized, and I love that I can write in my own dates.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa M.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool.
customer_reviews.text: Love this, I just wish it was sprial bound & the weeks pages would be within the month but other than that it is a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy
customer_reviews.text: This would be good for a bigger family with lots going on to much for just one kid
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the layout but wish it was spiral bound.
customer_reviews.author: Shangr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this planner! It's got everything I need for our first year in homeschooling!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney bland

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room for my kids, I like how I can keep everything in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I really like it if I wanted to buy a new one every yr. but since there is a 4 yr difference in my kids (one is 4 the other new born) I really don’t wanna buy a new one every year because I’m cheap, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn.brandon

product_meta.title: The A+ Homeschool Planner: Plan, Record, and Celebrate Each Child's Progress
